attributes.action: Ban all fireworks which are not silent.
attributes.additional_details: This is required as it’s not longer one / two nights a week during bonfire night but they’re used more and more for celebrations and during some religious celebrations they are used nightly for hours over a week. This is not only causes trauma to wildlife, farm animals but also pets who are affected for a longer period of time but also causes further trauma each time they’re used! Something that needs to be addressed as soon as possible and legislation needs to be brought into action immediately
attributes.background: To bring in legislation which states that fireworks are no longer allowed to be sold / used unless they’re silent ones.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition:

Ban the sale of all non-silent fireworks - https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/649354
